intro.title: A title for that story arc. Think of it like a chapter title.
story: A series of paragraphs, each represented as a string in a slice.
This is a new paragraph in this particular story arc.

options.text: the text to render for this option. eg 'venture down the dark passage'
options.arc: the name of the story arc to navigate to. This will match the story-arc key at the very root of the JSON document
